verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:1
verses.text: Then said Solomon, The Lord hath said that he would dwell in the thick darkness.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:2
verses.text: But I have built an house of habitation for thee, and a place for thy dwelling for ever.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:3
verses.text: And the king turned his face, and blessed the whole congregation of Israel: and all the congregation of Israel stood.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 6:4
verses.text: And he said, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, who hath with his hands fulfilled that which he spake with his mouth to my father David, saying,
